entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
